gradeDescription: A = I excelled at everything I did today!
whatIDidToday: played with as many buddies as possible
noteworthyComments: I had a great Monday!! We started off our day with some time outside. I had a wonderful time running around and playing with my friends. Later we went inside to have our training session. We worked on building confidence around moving objects. I did great. Afterwards I enjoyed a nap and another play session with my friends!!
